Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 10 Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika » 10.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
10.5.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
73.
1263Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, navippayutte satta. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1264Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
